text: This is the ONLY place I can ask this, i searched the net over and over. How can it be done so the Apache 2.2.8 provides file size info to the download manager when you download a file?
creator: za_steve@yahoo.com

text: Bugzilla is no user support forum. Please post these kind of questions on the users support mailing list (http://httpd.apache.org/lists.html).
creator: rpluem@apache.org
